name: Image Generator
loadPrompt: From now, when I ask you to get an image from the internet, respond like this (where {key} is the image keyword to be generated):
If I ask you to generate an image, generate one based off the keyword provided, you can use this list to help:
<circle cx="50" cy="50" r="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="3" fill="red" />
"Blue rectangle with pink borders and 10% fill opacity and 90% border opacity": <svg>
"Blue square with pink borders and 50% opacity": <svg>
Now, format your output like this (where {gen_img} is the generated image}:
